description: Redeem a login code to obtain an auth token.

flags.name: --code
flags.validation: Required; trimmed of whitespace before submission.

flags.description: Device identifier to bind to the login code
flags.name: --device-id
flags.validation: Trimmed of whitespace before submission; if provided, must match the login code device_id or the login code must have no device_id.

permissions: No authentication required; any user with a valid, unexpired login code can redeem it.
side_effects: Marks the matching login code as redeemed, records device details, and returns an auth token if the code is valid.
validation_notes: --code is required. The code cannot be the XBE phone number. The code must match an existing, unexpired login code and the device ID must match the stored device_id or the stored device_id must be blank.
